hero.subtitle: Learn about
hero.title:
Kid’s Playroom
Monitoring
hero.text:
Monitor your kids TV and video game consumption to prevent abuse.

Use the sensors available on your mobile device to monitor your environment.

items.title: Promote health TV and video game usage habits.
items.text: Measure how many minutes of TV and Video game your kids are consuming.

items.title: Help prevent your kids from suffering from eyestrain.
items.text: Get alerted when your kids are watching TV in the dark, a condition that might results in dry tired eye, and potentially cause headache to your kids.

items.title: Have fun and enjoy social and easy to use environment.
items.text: Get daily photo and video highlights from your kids room to save as souvenir or share on Facebook and Twitter.

items.title: Help prevent hearing losses.
items.text: Monitor the noise level in the play room and ensure that the TV volume is set at a healthy level. Get alerted when it goes above limits.

items.title: Know what your kids are watching.
items.text: Get live images from the play room, see what your kids are doing and what they are watching.

subhero.subtitle: Make sure to
subhero.title:
Set Limits
Together
subhero.text:
Help them monitor their behaviour without being intrusive.

Set limits with your kids using SensorFocus App.

notifications.subtitle: Lets you
notifications.title:
Stay Informed,
Stay in Control
notifications.text:
You can’t always be watching your news feed.

So SensorFocus App looks for activity and sends an alert to your phone if it sees something.

items.title: Set Limits Together
items.text: Set limits with your kids. Help them monitor their behaviour without being intrusive.

items.title: React Quickly on Abuse
items.text: SMS Text or email alerts delivered to your phone when TV or video game usage goes above custom limits.

items.title: Track Usage Over Time
items.text: Real time TV usage and noise exposure data. Reports for the last 1h, 24h and 7 day periods.

items.title: Secured solution
items.text: We work with Amazon Servers, most trusted secure solution.

items.title: Social
items.text: Easy to share content in social networks.

items.title: Easy to use
items.text: Our solution is designed to be used by everyone, not only experts.

items.title: Easy to install
items.text: The complete solution can be installed in a matter of minutes.

items.title: Green
items.text: Bring your old phones back to life!

items.title: Fun
items.text: Get notifications and pictures of the most important events.
